column4: I have an external hd and i can do anything with it. Its read only, how can i change that?
actually i believe it IS ntfs Jack_Sparrow
NOt advised to write to ntfs partitions
i ran that script and it still wont let me write to it
i go to deleat a file
and it says "Unable to move to trash, read only file system"
to delete a file you MUST write to a drive
what do you mean i must write to a drive?
deleting a files means you must write to the file allocation table that the file no longer exists..
you dont have write access so you can not delete a file
